name: LoopCity
description:
A Loop City Where Player Need To Break Free!!

Player need to find a way to escape this nightmare.

You suddenly wake up in a room inside a city, something tell you not right and you need to get away. In the process you collect as many coin as you can and can those coin buy you out of the city? Try and play this game right now!

The Game Doc is right here
